duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute Business Development plans in close coordination with Research Chemistry Service (RCS) leadership leading to identification, penetration, and growth of business and accounts in Western region.
Identify potential business prospects (leads) in the region across pharma, biotech, VC, non-profits, research institutes, agricultural, and veterinary sciences.
Qualify leads and present opportunities to the technical team and Research Chemistry Services senior leadership.
Facilitate business meetings with proper agenda, attendees, focus on opportunity, and follow-up.
Support proposal writing, negotiation, and presentations to customers.
Act as a point of contact for Research Chemistry Services and the customer, ensuring stable relationships and identifying areas of growth opportunity.
Represent Research Chemistry Services at various meetings/conferences and provide advice and solutions on complex matters.
Work with senior leadership during crisis management and facilitate customer travels to China.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in life sciences (preferably in chemistry) with 7+ years industrial experience with 5+ years of business development experience
